about_the_game:
The end of the 21st century. Science and technology already make it possible to record a human personality into a computer or connect microelectronic modules to a living brain. The consequences of environmental disasters and nuclear war have intertwined, creating a bizarre web of climatic and social anomalies. Civilization has approached the brink of destruction: industry is being destroyed, military operations and epidemics have claimed the lives of billions of people. The survivors are looking for ways to escape, and they will have to overcome the vast expanses of the dying Earth to meet and join forces.

Setting

After a catastrophic combination of circumstances, the world plunged into chaos and new threats and dangers arose. Gangs of feral deserters of the dead armies roam the devastated lands, plundering and destroying everything in their path, making ordinary survivors afraid of every rustle and shadow.

In the ruins of destroyed cities and in the vastness of former battlefields, automatic combat vehicles lurk, left without control and now destroying everything that stands in their way.

But the most terrible danger is the previously isolated AI centers, which are now striving to unite into a superintelligence that can pose a threat not only to people, but also to the very existence of the world.

Gameplay

A story-driven third-person adventure shooter with multiple playable characters.

EXODIUM Part 1

2087, Central Europe, Vienna.

In the face of the offensive of enemy armies and the threat of the use of thermonuclear weapons, a group of special forces is sent to the underground premises of the Institute of Genetics and Molecular Biotechnology to save the results of secret research and ensure their safe evacuation.

These soldiers have orders to destroy anyone who tries to oppose their mission.


(Do you want to know more? Download the demo!)

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain content that is unacceptable for someone at home or at work, such as: shameless outfits, zombified people, genetic hybrids, robots with human consciousness uploaded into them, the act of cyborgization, death from radiation and chemical contamination, long dialogues, rock and metal music and intelligent animals.
